achievements.name: "The Peak"
achievements.desc: Defeat The Peak in its weakened state.

achievements.name: "The Peak"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, do not let The Peak unleash its Saurian Stomp.

achievements.name: "Battlegoat" and "Ironclaw"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legends: Battlegoat and Ironclaw.

achievements.name: "Battlegoat" and "Ironclaw"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, have Battlegoat's charge collide with Ironclaw's headbutt 2 times.

achievements.name: "Battlegoat" and "Ironclaw"
achievements.desc: Defeat Battlegoat and Ironclaw at the same time by having Battlegoat's charge collide with Ironclaw's headbutt.

achievements.name: "Infinitesimal"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, avoid getting hit by Infinitesimal's Earthshaker Strike.

achievements.name: "Infinitesimal"
achievements.desc: Defeat Infinitesimal when it first enters a weakened state.

achievements.name: "Reji"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, have your characters be protected by a shield when being attacked by Reji, and the shield must not be destroyed.

achievements.name: "Reji"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, deflect 4 bullets in a row within a short period of time.

achievements.name: "Tupu's Lushness"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, no characters were downed.

achievements.name: "Tupu's Lushness"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, do not let the Electro Ward created by Tupu's Lushness reach more than half of its maximum value.
